messages.error_vehicle_not_found: Error: Vehicle '{vehicle}' not found and no default available. Available: {available}
messages.error_vehicle_not_specified: Error: Vehicle not specified and no default available.
messages.error_unit_unknown: Error: Unit for category '{category}' is unknown. Please provide --unit.
messages.error_quantity_missing: Error: Quantity not provided and no default found for '{category}'.
messages.error_openpyxl_missing: Error: openpyxl module not found. Cannot operate on local Excel files.
messages.success_row_added_sheet: Successfully added row to Google Sheet {vehicle}: {row}
messages.success_row_added_excel: Successfully added row to Local Excel {path}: {row}
messages.success_excel_created_template: Created new Excel file from template: {path}
